direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve modifying loan orders, but one is for repayment and the other is for renewal.
Both methods involve loan-related operations, but one is for borrowing and the other is for repayment.
The repayment method likely affects the data queried by the repayment history method, making it a good candidate for testing related scenarios.
Repayment operations may affect the ongoing orders, making it important to test how changes in repayment affect the ongoing orders.
Both methods access and manipulate collateral-related data, suggesting that testing one can inform the testing of the other.
